name: ControlOptionsHelper
description: The `ControlOptionsHelper` class provides access to control-related game options in Minecraft. This includes mouse settings, key bindings, toggles for various movement actions, and other input-related configurations. It allows scripts to read and modify control settings programmatically.
overview:
The `ControlOptionsHelper` class manages all player control settings:
- Mouse sensitivity and input settings
- Key bindings and their configurations
- Toggle functionality for sneaking and sprinting
- Auto-jump settings
- Raw mouse input and discrete scrolling options
- Access to all key binding categories and configurations

methods.name: getParent
methods.description: Returns the parent `OptionsHelper` instance.

methods.name: getMouseSensitivity
methods.description: Returns the current mouse sensitivity value.
examples:
const sensitivity = Options.control.getMouseSensitivity();
Chat.log(`Current mouse sensitivity: ${sensitivity}`);

methods.name: setMouseSensitivity
methods.description: Sets the mouse sensitivity to the specified value.

methods.name: isMouseInverted
methods.description: Returns whether the mouse Y-axis is inverted.

methods.name: invertMouse
methods.description: Sets whether to invert the mouse Y-axis.

methods.name: getMouseWheelSensitivity
methods.description: Returns the current mouse wheel sensitivity.

methods.name: setMouseWheelSensitivity
methods.description: Sets the mouse wheel sensitivity to the specified value.

parameters.name: val
parameters.description: The new mouse wheel sensitivity value

methods.name: isDiscreteScrollingEnabled
methods.description: Returns whether discrete scrolling is enabled. This option was added to address a bug on some systems where the mouse wheel would scroll too fast.

methods.name: enableDiscreteScrolling
methods.description: Sets whether to enable discrete scrolling.
examples:
// Enable discrete scrolling to prevent overly fast scrolling
Options.control.enableDiscreteScrolling(true).saveOptions();

methods.name: isTouchscreenEnabled
methods.description: Returns whether touchscreen mode is enabled.

methods.name: enableTouchscreen
methods.description: Sets whether to enable touchscreen mode.
examples:
// Enable touchscreen mode for tablet gameplay
Options.control.enableTouchscreen(true).saveOptions();

methods.name: isRawMouseInputEnabled
methods.description: Returns whether raw mouse input is enabled. Raw input directly reads mouse data without adjustments from other programs or the operating system.
examples:
const rawInput = Options.control.isRawMouseInputEnabled();
Chat.log(`Raw mouse input: ${rawInput}`);

methods.name: enableRawMouseInput
methods.description: Sets whether to enable raw mouse input.

parameters.name: val
parameters.description: Whether to enable raw mouse input

examples:
// Enable raw mouse input for more precise control
Options.control.enableRawMouseInput(true).saveOptions();

methods.name: isAutoJumpEnabled
methods.description: Returns whether auto-jump is enabled.

methods.name: enableAutoJump
methods.description: Sets whether to enable auto-jump.

methods.name: isSneakTogglingEnabled
methods.description: Returns whether the toggle functionality for sneaking is enabled.

methods.name: toggleSneak
methods.description: Sets whether to enable the toggle functionality for sneaking.

methods.name: isSprintTogglingEnabled
methods.description: Returns whether the toggle functionality for sprinting is enabled.

methods.name: toggleSprint
methods.description: Sets whether to enable the toggle functionality for sprinting.
examples:
// Enable toggle sprinting for long-distance travel
Options.control.toggleSprint(true).saveOptions();

methods.name: getRawKeys
methods.description: Returns an array of all raw Minecraft key bindings.
examples:
const rawKeys = Options.control.getRawKeys();
Chat.log(`Total key bindings: ${rawKeys.length}`);

methods.name: getCategories
methods.description: Returns a list of all key binding categories.

methods.name: getKeys
methods.description: Returns a list of all key names.

methods.name: getKeyBinds
methods.description: Returns a map of all key bindings and their bound keys.

methods.name: getKeyBindsByCategory
methods.description: Returns a map of key bindings and their bound keys for a specific category.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category to get keybindings from

methods.name: getKeyBindsByCategory
methods.description: Returns a map of all key binding categories, each containing a map of keybindings and their bound keys.
